original_title: Chamber of Construction Industry AGM tomorrow
original_body_lines: The Chamber of Construction Industry of Sri Lanka (CCI) will hold its 19th Annual General Meeting on 7 July at the Cinnamon Lakeside, Colombo at 6.00 p.m.

The Chamber was first established in 2001 as a company by guarantee and in 2019 was incorporated by an Act of Parliament. Now this Chamber has positioned itself as the main voice on issues affecting the construction industry and is committed to protecting and promoting the construction industry.
The President and the Board of Management with guidance from the Council has done much to mitigate the situation in these turbulent times of economic instability.
In a statement CCI expressed the hope that the country would gear up for brighter times as the President and Board of Management would be able to steer the industry to better days ahead.
